com.software.reuze

Class ac_CSP

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.ac_CSP
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ac_Map

    public class ac_CSP
extends Object
    Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3rd Ed.): Section 6.1, Page 202.

    A constraint satisfaction problem or CSP consists of three components, X, D, and C:
    • X is a set of variables, {X1, ... ,Xn}.
    • D is a set of domains, {D1, ... ,Dn}, one for each variable.
    • C is a set of constraints that specify allowable combinations of values.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ac_CSP(List<mf_NodeTermVariable> vars)
      Creates a new CSP for a fixed set of variables.
